channel.title: See "Swap File Creator ERROR" when boot up gateway
channel.description:
Saw the following warning when boot up the gateway.
failed! ################################################################################# ## Swap File Creator ERROR ## ## BASH_COMMAND: $CRYPTSETUP_FORMAT "$loop" ## exit_code: 1 ## ## Experts only: ## bash -x /etc/init.d/swap-file-creator restart ## for verbose output. Clean the output and ## submit to developers. ##################################################################################
Please tell me if I should be worry? Thank you guys.

item.title: See "Swap File Creator ERROR" when boot up gateway

item.description:
Can you please post the output of…?

item.title: See "Swap File Creator ERROR" when boot up gateway
item.dc:creator: microchip
item.description:
Saw the following warning when boot up the gateway.

failed!
#################################################################################

Swap File Creator ERROR

BASH_COMMAND: $CRYPTSETUP_FORMAT “$loop”

exit_code: 1

Experts only:

bash -x /etc/init.d/swap-file-creator restart

for verbose output. Clean the output and

submit to developers.

##################################################################################

Please tell me if I should be worry? Thank you guys.

Read full topic
item.source: See "Swap File Creator ERROR" when boot up gateway
